p: Fig 3 shows the model diagram of the ZIKV disease transmission pathways of both humans and the mosquito vector. Following our previous work [ 6, 40], we continue to assume that hosts infected with ZIKV are infectious during the convalescent stage and can infect other susceptible hosts through sexual transmission [ 8, 9]. However, they are assumed to be noninfectious to susceptible mosquito vectors [ 22, 42, 43].
